blocks.content: Demo: Deploying a Small Website to Vercel (My Most Used)

items: Prepare a website (with index.html) and push it to a GitHub Repository.
Log in to a Vercel account (GitHub login available).
Authorize and link the GitHub Repository.
Choose the project to deploy; Vercel auto-detects and configures.
Once completed, Vercel provides a default domain for site access.

blocks.alt: Demo of deploying a static website from GitHub to Vercel automatically

blocks.content: üìå Push updates to GitHub, and Vercel will automatically redeploy, keeping your site up to date.

blocks.title: Tip
blocks.content: Both Netlify and Vercel support automatic deployment from GitHub / GitLab / Bitbucket. Just push your code, and your site updates automatically.
